eu.jangos.auth.controller

Class AccountService

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.jangos.auth.controller.AccountService

  • public class AccountService
extends Object
    AccountService is the controller for account management. It allows to manager back-end database transparently as well as ensuring business rules such as failed login attempt. It handles the application logic.
    Version:
    v0.1 BETA.
    Author:
    Warkdev

      Constructor and Description
      AccountService()

    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountService

        public AccountService()

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        public Account getAccount(String name)
        Returns the account corresponding to the given name. The name must contain only alphanumeric values.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the account to be found.
        Returns:
        The account corresponding to the given name. Null if the account if not found.

      • checkExistence

        public boolean checkExistence(String name)
        It will check that a single account with a given named exists in the dabase.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the account used to login.
        Returns:
        true if an account with the given name exists in the database, false otherwise.

      • login

        public boolean login(Account account,
                     String ip,
                     String locale,
                     String session)
        Performs login update with the client information.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to login.
        ip - IP of the client who just logged in.
        locale - Locale of the client who just logged in.
        session - Hashed session key of the client who just logged in.
        Returns:
        A boolean value indicating whether the login action has been performed sucessfully.

      • isBanned

        public boolean isBanned(Account account,
                        String ip)
        Check whether the account or the client ip is banned or not.
        Parameters:
        account - Account to be checked.
        ip - IP of the client who is trying to log in.
        Returns:
        true if the account or the ip is banned, false otherwise. It returns false if there's no account loaded.

      • updateFailedAttempt

        public void updateFailedAttempt(Account account)
        This method updates the failed attempt counter of the account. If the number of attempts is higher than the maxFailedAttempt parameter, it locks the account
        Parameters:
        account - The account for which the failed attempt must be updated.

      • update

        public void update(Account account)
        This method updates the account information into the database.
        Parameters:
        account - The account to update in the dabatase.
